name: Cosmetic Paradise
storyline: Lipgloss, blusher, eyeliner...everything a girl needs to look stunning. You're the new recruit at the beauty salon but can you work your make-up magic on the whole town?
summary:
You play as the Princess of Charmville, training under Marina and Whimsey to become queen. As part of your training, you must help the people of the town with your makeup skills.

In addition to working at Pamper House, you can play 6 different mini-games to gain more charmstones to purchase extra makeup, new hairstyles and clothing for your character.

It has a sequel, Cosmetic Paradise: Make no Kiseki, released as Imagine: Makeup Artist in North America as part of Ubisoft's Imagine series.
